name: postflop_tuning_v2
description: Validate 3 post-flop aggression differentiation fixes: (1) neutral floor bug fix — raises below threshold get -EV regardless of cost_to_call, (2) profile-gated raise option limits — passive=1, TAG=2, LAG=3, (3) differentiated check promotion — passive always promotes, LAG suppresses when raises exist. Compare absolute metrics vs experiment 3 baselines.
hypothesis: Combined fixes will produce >20pp post-flop raise gap between aggressive and passive profiles while maintaining >30pp VPIP gap. Bob Ross post-flop raise rate should drop to 10-20% (from ~40%).
